full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 187 of 228 863 LC2VMAX6 were about two inches thick. So you'll return to that. I agree, based on that answer, which I had assumed would provide a foundation. MS. COMEY: Yes, your Honor. THE COURT: But it didn't. So unless there's further foundation, I'll sustain the lack of foundation objection and I'll tell the jury to disregard Mr. Alessi's testimony that it was a later version of the book. Okay, Mr. Pagliuca? MR. PAGLIUCA: Yes, your Honor. That's appropriate. THE COURT: Okay. We'll bring in the witness. The witness while we're getting the jury, please. Thank you. (Witness present) (Jury present) THE COURT: You may be seated. Thank you so much, members of the jury. All right. Ms. Comey, you may continue your direct of Mr. Alessi. Mr. Alessi, I remind you, you are under oath. Go ahead. MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. BY MS. COMEY: Q. Good afternoon, Mr. Alessi. A. Good afternoon. Q. I want to return to talking about the booklet. And in SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012472
